name: steps-s3-copy
description: The root package of a mono repo for Steps S3 copy

scripts.dev-deploy: cd dev && pnpm -w run build && pnpx cdk deploy
scripts.dev-destroy: cd dev && pnpm -w run build && pnpx cdk destroy
scripts.dev-test: cd dev-testsuite && pnpx tsx test.mts StepsS3Copy

author.name: University of Melbourne Centre for Cancer Research
